messages.title: Brexit negotiations
messages.content: Brexit negotiations start 11 days after you vote. If you want to make sure Brexit is a success, you need to ensure Theresa May can get the best deal for Britain.

messages.title: Your local vote will decide
messages.content: The choice at this election is clear. It’s strong and stable leadership with Theresa May and the Conservatives or a coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A vote for Theresa May and the Conservatives is a vote for strong and stable leadership in the national interest. With her team, Theresa May will build a stronger economy and secure a better brexit deal.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A loss of just 6 seats would cost the Conservatives a majority, leading to a coalition of chaos led by Jeremy Corbyn.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit negotiations start 11 days after you vote. If you want to make sure Brexit is a success, you need to ensure Theresa May can get the best deal for Britain.
issues.economy: A vote for Theresa May is a vote for strong and stable leadership in the national interest. Only Theresa May and the Conservatives will ensure that the economy stays strong.
issues.governance: It’s strong and stable leadership with Theresa May and the Conservatives or a coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.

contactInformation.address: CCHQ, 4 Matthew Parker Street, London, SW1H 9HQ

endorsements.endorsement: The IMF says economic stability is growing, creating jobs.

images.caption: Theresa May with the message 'Strong Leadership. A clear Economic Plan. A brighter, more secure future.' and 'BACK THERESA MAY AS PRIME MINISTER'
